text: The Brahman is an Indian breed of zebuine-taurine hybrid beef cattle. Originating from the Krishna Valley. The Brahman has a high tolerance of heat, sunlight and humidity, and good resistance to parasites. It has been exported to many countries, particularly in the tropics. It is Sacred and Holy to Hindus, and therefore it is considered as the “National cattle of India” respectively. Category:National symbols of India Category:Maharashtra Category:Cattle Category:Mammals of Asia
title: Brahman cattle
